author: The Hindu Net Desk
title: Hydroxychloroquine: Can the anti-malarial drug contain COVID-19?
description: Anti-malarial drug hydroxychloroquine shot to fame as it is shown to have shortened the time to clinical recovery of COVID-19 patients
content:
Hydroxychloroquine (HCQ) is an anti-malarial drug similar to chloroquine, one of the oldest and best-known anti-malarial drugs, but with lesser side-effects. It can be bought over the counter and is fairly inexpensive.
